analysis.description:
Reentrancy in KlerosLiquid.execute (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1657-1737):
	External calls:
	- pinakion.transfer(vote.account,tokenReward) (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1689)
	- pinakion.transferFrom(vote.account,this,penalty) (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1699-1701)
	- pinakion.balanceOf(vote.account) < jurors[vote.account].stakedTokens || ! vote.voted (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1709-1713)
	- _setStake(vote.account,jurors[vote.account].subcourtIDs[j],0) (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1713)
	- dispute.tokensAtStakePerJuror[_appeal] > pinakion.balanceOf(vote.account) (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1696-1697)
	- penalty = pinakion.balanceOf(vote.account) (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1696-1697)
	External calls sending eth:
	- vote.account.send(ETHReward) (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1690)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- disputes (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1729)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#583-584) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#677-710)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#786-804)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#880-896)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#903-914)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#980-984) is declared view but contains assembly code
KlerosLiquid.extraDataToSubcourtIDAndMinJurors (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1976-1995) is declared view but contains assembly code
KlerosLiquid.accountAndSubcourtIDToStakePathID (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#2001-2017) is declared view but contains assembly code
KlerosLiquid.stakePathIDToAccountAndSubcourtID (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#2022-2033) is declared view but contains assembly code

KlerosLiquid.onlyDuringPeriod (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1243-1245) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(disputes[_disputeID].period == _period)
	- require(bool)(disputes[_disputeID].period == _period)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol:
	Contract RNG has payable functions:
	 - contribute (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#249-250)
	 - requestRN (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#251-253)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in KlerosLiquid._setStake (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1922-1971):
	External calls:
	- ! (_stake == 0 || pinakion.balanceOf(_account) >= newTotalStake) (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1941-1944)

	- jurors (/unique_chucks/6/0x988b3a538b618c7a603e1c11ab82cd16dbe28069.sol#1955)
